recipes.author: Kristine
recipes.title: Pan-Seared Steak
recipes.description: Cook steak at the comforts of your home
recipes.ingredients: Raw steak, butter, thyme, olive oil, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions:
Remove moisture from raw steak
Rub salt & pepper
Pre-heat pan
Lather with olive oil
Put raw & seasoned steak in pan
